newsitem.title: USA: TextWare, FileNet in marketing alliance.
newsitem.headline: TextWare, FileNet in marketing alliance.

text.p: TextWare Corp and FileNet Corp said they agreed to a cooperative development and marketing alliance aimed at the automated indexing and forms processing markets.

The companies will work together on a software link that enables document images captured by FileNet's WorkFlo/Scan software to be passed to TextWare's FormWare software for indexing and forms processing.
The companies said they also will collaborate on future products for automated indexing and forms processing needs.
TextWare said in a separate release that it has agreed to a joint distribution pact with Elsag Bailey, a company of Finmeccanica SpA.
TextWare will integrate Elsag Bailey's Reader Engine into its FormWare software and remarket it in the United States.
Elsag Bailey will use TextWare's FormWare software as a platform for automated indexing and forms processing projects and remarket FormWare throughout Europe.
The agreement is expected to be executed on or before June 30, 1997, the companies said.
